data.text:
Welcome to Hong Kong Edition, your guide to the people and money shaking up the Asian financial hub. Subscribe here if you like this newsletter. Or email us with any feedback.

This week, finance reporter Denise Wee takes a look at how out-of-work bankers can reinvent themselves and senior editor Richard Frost reviews a storied century-old restaurant that just reopened.
